articles.title: Xi to meet Putin in first trip outside China since COVID began - Reuters
articles.description: Xi Jinping will leave China for the first time in more than two years for a trip this week to Central Asia where he will meet Russia's Vladimir Putin, just a month before he is set to cement his place as the most powerful Chinese leader since Mao Zedong.
